introduction.title: Interview Candidate Site
introduction.description: We have interviewed many Filipinos in the past, and noticed that the self-introductions from our Japanese-speaking candidates tend to follow a similar pattern, which charmingly reflects a cultural consistency, though it makes it a bit tricky for us to glimpse the unique personalities behind each one. We realized they use the same format, and we wanted something different.
introduction.description2: So, we've developed a new kind of resume system that lets us discover not just a candidate's skills but also their personality and uniqueness during the interview.
introduction.description3: This innovative resume allows candidates to share their favorite photos, videos, and answer special questions in a dedicated section. By visiting a website and inputting their details, they can create and download a distinctive and personalized resume in PDF format. Moreover, if a candidate is chosen for the position, they can receive an employment contract on their mobile phone within 30 minutes and sign it using digital signature technology.
introduction.description4: This means that as soon as a candidate is selected, they can immediately receive and sign the employment contract, enabling them to apply for immigration the following day. Entering personal details into this system, along with uploading a passport copy and the notification of passing the prometric test, allows for the swift preparation of application documents for the Immigration Bureau.
introduction.description5: This system was designed to significantly reduce the delay between interviewing, hiring, and visa application processes. We kindly ask for your support in this initiative.

uniqueQuestions.1: 1. If a movie were made about your life, what would the title be?
uniqueQuestions.2: 2. What was your favorite game as a child?
uniqueQuestions.3: 3. If you had the power to change one thing about the world, what would it be?
uniqueQuestions.4: 4. Tell us about a principle or belief that you hold dear.
uniqueQuestions.6: 6. If you could have dinner with any celebrity, who would you choose?
uniqueQuestions.7: 7. What is the achievement you are most proud of in your life?
uniqueQuestions.8: 8. What trait do you have that is most valued by your friends and family?
uniqueQuestions.9: 9. If you could experience one thing just once in your lifetime, what would it be?
uniqueQuestions.10: 10. What is an important lesson you want to share with others?
uniqueQuestions.11: 11. What event has changed your life the most?
uniqueQuestions.12: 12. If everything was going to end tomorrow, what would you do today?
uniqueQuestions.13: 13. What is the most valuable thing you have learned from someone else?
uniqueQuestions.14: 14. Where is your ideal place to live?
uniqueQuestions.15: 15. Who is the person that has had the most influence on your life and why?
uniqueQuestions.16: 16. What has been the most challenging thing you have faced, and how did you overcome it?
uniqueQuestions.17: 17. If you could experience a different profession for one day, what would it be?
uniqueQuestions.18: 18. What is the most important tradition for you?
uniqueQuestions.19: 19. What is your ultimate stress-relief activity?
uniqueQuestions.20: 20. What is the greatest adventure you have ever been on?
uniqueQuestions.21: 21. Who has taught you the most valuable lesson in life?
uniqueQuestions.22: 22. If you could learn a new skill starting tomorrow, what would it be?
uniqueQuestions.23: 23. What was the strangest dream you had as a child?
uniqueQuestions.24: 24. If you could live anywhere for a month, where would it be?
uniqueQuestions.25: 25. If you could become any animal, which would you want to be?
uniqueQuestions.26: 26. What is the most beautiful moment you have experienced?
uniqueQuestions.27: 27. What song has the most influence on your life?
uniqueQuestions.28: 28. If you were writing your autobiography, which chapter would be the most exciting?
uniqueQuestions.29: 29. What are you most thankful for?
uniqueQuestions.30: 30. What advice would you give to your future self?

title: Philippine HR Development Lab
subTitle: Consistent support from Japanese language education to aftercare.
We provide a one-stop service from talent referral to recruitment.

about.label: About Us
description: Hello, we at the Philippine Human Resource Development Lab (hereinafter referred to as FJL) primarily focus on the development and placement of Filipino talents who can speak Japanese. Amidst the numerous companies facilitating foreign talent placement, we specialize exclusively in nurturing and placing Filipino talents.

In our welfare services division's home visit care office, many Filipinos are employed. When collaborating with foreign nationals, it's crucial to understand their culture, customs, religious beliefs, and values. It's important to recognize and respect each other as individuals to build a relationship based on respect and trust. The charm of Filipino talents lies undoubtedly in their carefree smiles and seriousness. Their presence tends to create a bright and fun atmosphere at the workplace, which is one of their many appealing traits.

By collaborating with foreign workers with these points in mind, you can utilize talents with diverse cultures and values and deepen mutual understanding. In particular, Filipino talents are expected to brighten and enliven the workplace environment due to their cheerful and hardworking nature. FJL supports the recruitment activities of many companies handling foreign talents, offering a wide range of services including training programs and follow-up support that take into account the cultural and customary differences between Japan and the Philippines. Recruiting foreign talent has many challenges and difficulties. However, with the right recruitment mindset, understanding and respecting each other's cultures and customs, you can achieve good results.
signature: President and Director / Foreign Employment Labor Consultant
